page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT HALWELL/MORELEIGH
page.content:
Of 240 adults, 45 are engaged in farming; some are also Agricultural Contractors and the wife of one runs a milk round. Moreleigh has a firm of Builders & Undertakers (with Chapel of Rest), another of coal and cattle Hauliers, 2 Carpenters (self employed) and another Haulier. The Garage, Halwell, servicing cars and selling petrol, employs 6.
There are 14 professionals, mostly working outside the area, including 7 Teachers, 2 Doctors and an Accountant. The Vicar has 4 Parishes in his care.20 others are variously employed outside the area and 55 are retired.
All recent schooleavers have been absorbed either into employment or Government Training Schemes.
